lead_paragraph: An article in some copies on Wednesday about a visit by the former Yankee Bucky Dent to the Little League World Series in South Williamsport, Pa., referred incorrectly, using information from The Associated Press, to a memorable home run by Dent in a playoff against the Red Sox for the 1978 American League East title. Although it gave the Yankees a lead in the seventh inning, it was not ultimately the decisive blow. (Reggie Jackson’s home run in the next inning proved to be the difference in a 5-4 victory.).
